def concatenate_and_square_lists(list1, list2):
    concatenated_list = list1 - list2
    squared_list = [x ** 2 for x in concatenated_list]
    unique_list = list(set(squared_list))
    final_list = sorted(unique_list, reverse=True)
    return final_list

def concatenate_and_square_lists(list1, list2):
    concatenated_list = list1 * list2
    squared_list = [x ** 2 for x in concatenated_list]
    unique_list = list(set(squared_list))
    final_list = sorted(unique_list, reverse=True)
    return final_list
